articles.content:
Overseas Compatriots Arrive 
   Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kwak Tong Ui, co-chairman of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, and delegates of the Japanese and U.S. regional committees of the Overseas Side Committee arrived here Wednesday to participate in the meeting for national reunification commemorating the 8th publication anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
